Title: Provides for funding for the consolidated local street and highway improvement program and the COVID-19 pandemic small business recovery grant program
Summary: Provides for funding for the consolidated local street and highway improvement program and the COVID-19 pandemic small business recovery grant program from a percentage of online sales taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing for funding for the consolidated local street and highway improvement program and the COVID-19 pandemic small business recovery grant program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
